attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Our major towns have had roads closed to vehicles by your local council, our own town has over 100 roads closed, this creates CONGESTION to create the myth that we have a congestion problem that does not exist!OPEN UP ALL THESE ROADS HEY PRESTO NO CONGESTION!

rejection.details: The petition is fine, but please address the excessive use of capital letters. They make the text hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
